lyrics:
6 contributorsa man this lonely lyricsverse 1
a man this lonely a man this blue
a man whose worlds been torn in two
needs somebody with a heart thats true
a man this lonely needs a woman like you

verse 2
two arms this empty need someone to hold
a man this lost needs somewhere to go
when the nights go on forever and the days do too
a man this lonely needs a woman like you

bridge
id lost hope i was so far down
here you come turnin all that around
id come to think of love as a lie
all thats on my mind now is you by my side

verse 3
oh a man this lonely a man this lonely a man this blue a man this blue
a man whose worlds been torn in two
needs somebody needs somebody with a heart thats true
a man this lonely needs a woman like you

outro
a man this lonely needs a woman like yousee brooks  dunn liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likeembed
